attributes.action: For our children's sake, let's clean up our air. Clean Air Act 2019
attributes.additional_details:
Air pollution causes 28,000 to 36,000 deaths a year in the UK, estimates from the Committee on the Medical Effects of Air Pollutants have shown.

Now just imagine the untold damage that it has on those of us alive?

https://www.who.int/en/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/ambient-(outdoor)-air-quality-and-health

https://uk-air.defra.gov.uk/air-pollution/effects?view=short-term

https://uk-air.defra.gov.uk/air-pollution/daqi?view=more-info
attributes.background:
If air pollution was a person, we wouldn't stand for this invisible killer suffocating millions of lungs. 

Now just imagine the damage that it has on us alive? 

A rise in asthma cases, coronary heart disease, strokes and lung cancers are all health conditions related to air pollution.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take to tackle air pollution.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to see happen.
